metadata.title: Convert Feet to Kilometers – Length Converter
metadata.description: Convert length from Feet to Kilometers, useful for understanding large distances in metric.

introduction: This converter transforms length measurements from Feet to Kilometers, bridging imperial and metric scales.
Very large distances in feet often need conversion to kilometers for metric understanding.
This converter uses the standard relationship where 1 kilometer equals exactly 3,280.84 feet.
methodology: 1 km = 3,280.84 feet. To convert feet to kilometers, divide by 3,280.84. For example, 3,280.84 feet = 1 km, 32,808.4 feet = 10 km.
Altitude, elevation, and large distances are measured in feet in the US but kilometers internationally.
Understanding conversion helps with sports, aviation, and geographical distance comparisons.
This converter provides precise length conversions.
examples: Example 1 – Altitude: Mount Everest is 29,032 feet ≈ 8.85 kilometers.
Example 2 – Aviation: A cruise altitude of 35,000 feet ≈ 10.67 kilometers.
Example 3 – Distance: A 1-mile run is 5,280 feet ≈ 1.61 kilometers.

faqs.question: What is the conversion from Feet to Kilometers?
faqs.answer: 1 km = 3,280.84 feet. Divide feet by 3,280.84 to get kilometers.

faqs.question: How many feet in a mile?
How many feet in a meter?

glossary.definition: Imperial unit of length equal to 0.3048 meters.
Metric unit of length equal to 1,000 meters.
